description_card.description: I am <0>software developer</0> with a focus on <0>Front-end</0>, where I've accrued nearly <0>3 years</0> of experience. Additionally, I've also worked on the <0>Back-end</0> for about <0>2 and a half</0> years, thus enhancing my understanding of their connection and effective communication. <1></1> <1></1>Throughout my career, I underwent a transition where initially I worked as a back-end developer, then subsequently shifted to the front-end, consolidating and expanding my skills. <1></1> <1></1>Committed to continuous improvement through academies, master programs, and personal studies.
